cards.title: Label Tags
cards.code:
<!-- Nested label -->
<label>Click me
  <input type="text" id="user" name="name"/>
</label>

<!-- 'for' attribute -->
<label for="user">Click me</label>
<input id="user" type="text" name="name"/>
cards.description: for in a label references an input's id attribute
